officeHours: 9-5, weekends and after hours by appointment
description:
The Law Firm of William B. White, Esq., is a litigation firm with an emphasis on family law and personal injury law. Located in Flagler Beach, Florida, I am ready to help you whenever you face a family law issue or have sustained an injury caused by someone's negligence or wrongdoing. I proudly serve family law clients throughout Central Florida, from Orange to Flagler counties and personal injury clients throughout the entire State of Florida

My Family Law services include the following:

  • Divorce and uncontested divorce
  • Child custody and support
  • Alimony and spousal support
  • Time sharing and parenting plans
  • Paternity
  • Modifications
  • Relocation

The personal injury legal services provided by William B. White, Esq., include the following:

  • Motor vehicle accidents, including auto, truck and motorcycle
  • Pedestrian accidents
  • Bicycle accidents
  • Boating accidents
  • Premises liability, including slip-and-falls and dog bites and a few interesting Florida Bed Bug cases
  • Defective products
All personal injury cases are handled on a contingency basis meaning theres is no cost to you if I do not resolve your case.

From the time of your free initial consultation, you will find me to be approachable, caring and empathetic. I will take the time to get to know you, learn your story, answer your questions and advise you of your options going forward. I will then put my knowledge, experience and skill to work on your behalf. I offer virtual appointments and accept all major credit cards for your maximum convenience.
